description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fight across the galaxy in an exciting 2D tower defence game. Build towers, research upgrades, and obliterate the enemy in 10 campaign missions and skirmish mode. The war needs you! For Earth! And all her colonies!
description.short: Fight across the galaxy in an exciting 2D tower defence game. Build towers, research upgrades, and obliterate the enemy in 10 campaign missions and skirmish mode. The war needs you! For Earth! And all her colonies!
